_header: It was upon a Sheer Thursday that our Lord arose
_description: The Bargain of Judas — eighteen couplets

CamTCC323.First Lines:
Hit wes upon a scereþorsday þat vre louerd arosful milde
                    were þe wordes he spec to iudas…
CamTCC323.Last Lines:
…Stille þou be peter wel i þe ic noweÞou wolt
                    fur sake me þrien ar þe coc him crowe
